sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {Table} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {USDFormat} from '../libs/numberFormat' import {Deposit} from './Deposit' import {Withdraw} from './Withdraw' function Summary(props) { const [refresh,setRefresh] = useState(false); const handleRefresh = () => { console.log("Inside Summary refresh") props.refresh() setRefresh(!{refresh}.refresh); } return (
Profit/Loss {USDFormat(props.summary.pnl)}
NPV {USDFormat(props.summary.npv)}
Cash Deposited    {USDFormat(props.summary.accountbalance)}
Amount Allocated {USDFormat(props.summary.amountallocated)}
Usage (%) {props.summary.usagelevel}
Amount Free    {USDFormat(props.summary.amountfree)}
); } export default Summary;
